Hey all!

PhotonVision v2025.1.1 is released.

This is our first recommended version of the season.

A full changelog is below. We appreciate the community’s patience in making sure multiple of these issues were resolved, as we believe it will lead to a much better user experience through the rest of the season.

Aside from the developers below, we also wanted to give a sincere thanks to all the teams who helped test the release these past few days. These include members of 2471, 3256, 3546, 8429, 8847, 1736, and multiple others.

Install

Note that we recommend that users start off a “fresh slate” for 2025. This means you should fully reimage your coprocessor.

Installation instructions are the same as usual and can be found here.

New since Beta 8

The biggest changes since Beta 8 include:

  • Inclusion of the 2025 FRC field Apriltag layout by default

  • Convert to user selected camera matching by oh-yes-0-fps in Convert to user selected camera matching by oh-yes-0-fps · Pull Request #1556 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

  • Adding timeSyncServer for Python by gerth2 in Adding timeSyncServer for Python by gerth2 · Pull Request #1675 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

  • Add custom RKNN model upload card by Sam948-byte in Add custom models by samfreund · Pull Request #1687 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

    image1272×716 37.3 KB

  • Ingest wpilib!7609 and add turbo button by @mcm001 in Ingest wpilib!7609 and add turbo button by mcm001 · Pull Request #1662 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

    • On Linux devices, we now report image capture timestamp, increasing latency calculation accuracy (previously under-reported by up to 2 frame times)
    • Publishing True to /photonvision/use_new_cscore_frametime may potentially increase your camera framerate, at the cost of extra latency, on certain platforms

  • Add arducam model warning by Juniormunk in Add arducam model warning by Juniormunk · Pull Request #1669 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

    image1274×457 165 KB

What’s coming next?

Bug fixes will again remain top priority through the season.If you run into any issue, big or small, we’d ask for your help by:

  • Reach out on discord if you’re unsure about root cause, or need help diagnosing
  • Document the issue on the issues in our github.

Additionally, Providing a “just works” machine learning model for coral and algae is also very high on the list. While (again) there’s no specific timeline for delivery, there’s active work and testing happening on a 10k+ image dataset right now. Reach out on discord if you’re interested in contributing, or trying out bleeding-edge models!

Finally, we still owe a few updates to our examples. In particular, NT4 has allowed each vision sample to be processed individually - getting the “latest” only is no longer a constraint. Our examples show an older way of doing this, and need to be updated to the latest recommendations.

Known issues:

Activated CSI (ribbon cable) cameras may cause PhotonVision to crash if unplugged. As a workaround, don’t unplug active CSI cameras, or disable if not in use.

What’s Changed

  • photonlibpy: Explicitly re-export by @auscompgeek in #1737
  • Fix typos and incorrect param order in Javadoc by @Gold856 in #1740
  • Add FontAwesome assets by @Gold856 in #1734
  • Change SimCameraProperties to enable chaining of setters by @ancientstraits in #1731
  • Yolo docs minimalist by @samfreund in #1723
  • Fix fallback for the multitag on rio pose strategy by @KangarooKoala in #1755
  • Add 3D tracking of the 2025 Algae in Colored Shape pipelines by @samdev-7 in #1756
  • Upload new algae RKNN model by @samfreund in #1758
  • Add YOLO11 Support by @samfreund in #1736
  • Update Allowed Naming Conventions For Object Detection Models by @samfreund in #1749
  • Update install command for Romi by @crschardt in #1746
  • Verify WPILib/OpenCV versions at runtime by @mcm001 in #1772
  • fix: remove unnecessary readme badges by @samfreund in #1768
  • Add version checking to C++ by @spacey-sooty in #1774
  • Add 6328’s implementation of PNP distance for Trig Solving to PhotonPoseEstimator by @JuliusZhou124 in #1767
  • Add back pr template by @KangarooKoala in #1782
  • Clean up pnp distance trig solve by @KangarooKoala in #1781
  • [build] Bump WPILib to 2025.3.1 by @samfreund in #1785
  • Stop unknown coprocessor stats / no output from shell commands. by @Juniormunk in #1786
  • Add constrained solvePNP strategy by @mcm001 in #1682
  • Update camera calibration docs to add calib.io targets note by @owen1050 in #1732
  • fix: docs updates for the different apriltag field layouts by @samfreund in #1787

We’re trying to use the new PNP_DISTANCE_TRIG_SOLVE strategy. We get very weird results for the pose. This is how we update the heading:

for (int j = 0; j < gyroReadings.get().length; j++) {
            localPoseEstimator.addHeadingData(
                    gyroReadingsTimestamps.get()[j], gyroReadings.get()[j]);
        }

We use AdvnatageKit’s vision and swerve templates.

  • gyroReadings is gyroInputs.odometryYawPositions which is updated by navX.getYaw().
  • gyroReadingsTimestamps is gyroInputs.odometryYawTimestamps which is updated by PhoenixOdometryThread.

PhotonVision v2025.3.1 is released!

Notable Changes

  • This release requires WPILib 2025.3.2.

  • By popular demand, a toggle has been added to disable the drawn crosshair in driver mode. If you wanted to use your coprocessor instead of your RIO to display the raw camera stream, this is the release for you. Added by samfreund in feat: crosshair toggle for driver mode by samfreund · Pull Request #1822 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

  • Fix CONSTRAINED_SOLVEPNP causing a crash due to OpenCV not being loaded by Gold872 in Force load opencv before using OpenCV functions by Gold872 · Pull Request #1808 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

  • Add alerts for timesync and disconnection by Gold872 in Add alerts for timesync and disconnection by Gold872 · Pull Request #1799 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

  • Changes to the problem formulation for CONSTRAINED_SOLVEPNP to increase performance by mcm001 in Use normalized pixels in cPNP problem formulation by mcm001 · Pull Request #1816 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

  • Fix snapshot taking only working when connected to FMS by Gold856 in Fix snapshot methods not working by Gold856 · Pull Request #1815 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

Remaining Changes

  • Fix rknn detection for non opi platforms by TheTripleV in Fix rknn detection for non opi platforms by TheTripleV · Pull Request #1797 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

  • Make macOS arm wording generic by spacey-sooty in Make macOS arm wording generic by spacey-sooty · Pull Request #1796 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

  • Cleanup Docs for PhotonPoseEstimator by JuliusZhou124 in Cleanup Docs for PhotonPoseEstimator by JuliusZhou124 · Pull Request #1795 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

  • fix: docs for YOLOv11 naming by samfreund in fix: docs for YOLOv11 naming by samfreund · Pull Request #1806 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

  • Check MSVC Runtime before loading natives by person4268 in Check MSVC Runtime before loading natives by person4268 · Pull Request #1809 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

  • [docs] Add a warning about streams on different ports by spacey-sooty in [docs] Add a warning about streams on different ports by spacey-sooty · Pull Request #1810 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

  • chore: bump wpilib to 2025.3.2 and fix mypy errors by samfreund in chore: bump wpilib to 2025.3.2 and fix mypy errors by samfreund · Pull Request #1819 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

  • fix: remove debugging printout for snapshot methods by samfreund in fix: remove debugging printout for snapshot methods by samfreund · Pull Request #1823 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

  • [Docs] Fix broken hyperlink (Fixes 1802) by JA-01 in [Docs] Fix broken hyperlink (Fixes #1802) by JA-01 · Pull Request #1821 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

  • Increase precision on displayed target distance by Gold856 in Increase precision on displayed target distance by Gold856 · Pull Request #1833 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

  • Document UI hot reload option in dev docs by Gold856 in Document UI hot reload option in dev docs by Gold856 · Pull Request #1834 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

  • Fix dead link on Networking page in Quick Start by Gold856 in Fix dead link on Networking page in Quick Start by Gold856 · Pull Request #1843 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

  • Add tests for TSP by mcm001 in Add tests for TSP by mcm001 · Pull Request #1844 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

  • Dont sanitize unique name in calibration JSON HTTP URL by mcm001 in Dont sanitize unique name in calibration JSON HTTP URL by mcm001 · Pull Request #1846 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

New Contributors

  • Gold872 made their first contribution in Force load opencv before using OpenCV functions by Gold872 · Pull Request #1808 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub

  • JA-01 made their first contribution in [Docs] Fix broken hyperlink (Fixes #1802) by JA-01 · Pull Request #1821 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub
